page.title: 13LOCAL INDUSTRY & FARMING
page.content: In the late spring there are slurry tankers and silage trailers.In the mid summer there are mostly hay kickers and balers.In the late summer there is always a second cutting of silage and so there are more slurry tankers and silage harvesters.In late summer and early autumn there are combines. There is a sand and gravel company just outside our area and most of the heavy lorry traffic is associated with it. Other lorries carry building materials or rubble and soil for land reclamation. There is a mobile grocery van which comes from the local shop.Milk is delivered daily.
